Title: Relates to awarding contracts for the purchase of rock salt or sodium chloride mined or hand harvested in Canada
Summary: Permits contracts for the purchase of rock salt or sodium chloride mined or hand harvested in Canada to be awarded as if such rock salt or sodium chloride was mined or hand harvested in the United States.
LawCode: Amd ยง162-a, St Fin L; amd ยง104-d, Gen Muni L; amd ยง2877-a, Pub Auth L; amd ยง12-a, Hway L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, the general municipal law, the public authorities law and the highway law, in relation to awarding contracts for the purchase of rock salt or sodium chloride mined or hand harvested in Canada
